products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout cream panel blind in cream. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product id: db-pan0250 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout dove grey panel blind in grey. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This dove grey panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3.5 metres drop! 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-pan0265 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Oyster (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bella oyster (blackout) blackout panel blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout panel blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm
 	composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets.
